title: How much cost to ship a xbox one? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on distance and transport provider. I guess you care about costs, so i would suggest you using https://clicktrans.com/ . It’s nice to save on shipping but its also good to make sure that your electronics will be well treated. In case of clicktrans you can be sure about both, as there are only verified transport providers, and you can see feedback from previous clients
it ranges but like around 220 to 250 but you could also get a refurbished one for like 160 to 190 but if you keep on looking you can get one for 125 dollars
